content: * **You can't parry naturally, but you can unlock spells that allow you to deflect**. Keep progressing through the game and you'll unlock the ability to stagger enemies and open them up to counterattacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Essential_Tips_and_Tricks.md', within the main section titled 'Essential Tips and Tricks', specifically from the subsection 'Combat Tips'.
The content is as follows:
* **You can't parry naturally, but you can unlock spells that allow you to deflect**. Keep progressing through the game and you'll unlock the ability to stagger enemies and open them up to counterattacks.
